alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 19 at 2:45AM MDT until March 21 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches in the western Uinta mountains and 12 to 24 inches elsewhere in the northern and central mountains with locally higher amounts in the Upper Cottonwoods. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, Wasatch Mountains South of I-80, Western Uinta Mountains, Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs and Central Mountains. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 3 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Prepare for winter driving conditions across high elevation routes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
